20
NAEB RADIO NE1W0RK
JFROGRAM OFFERING PROGRAM OFFERING
Title: GEORGETOWN UNIVERSITY
RADIO FORUM
Type: Panel discussion
Time: 29:30
No.: 13 for this quarter
Origin: Georgetown University
Audience: Adult
Release Date: Upon Arrival
The GEORGETOWN UNIVERSITY RADIO FORUM, winner of many local and national
awards, is a continuous series of discussions of significant topics by
authorities. Unlike most other panel discussions, this series has as
its object clarification rather than controversy.
It will not be possible for us to list topics and speakers in advance.
The tapes will be flown from Washington, D. C. the day of each original
broadcast, and we will dub and ship them as soon as possible.
In the event of a very timely program, we will substitute a non-timely
discussion from a group of Forum programs on our shelves.
